summary: The All Blacks, New Zealand's national rugby team, are one of the most successful sports teams globally. They've won the Rugby World Cup three times and have an impressive 77% win record in international test matches since 1903. The team has defeated many nations and holds the record for the longest time at the number-one ranking since 2003. They compete in the Rugby Championship and have completed grand slam tours against the Home Nations. The All Blacks are known for their iconic black uniforms and the haka, a traditional MƒÅori challenge dance, performed before each game.
title: New Zealand national rugby union team
